thread.title: Simone Biles and Shaq standing side by side at Super Bowl is like a dang optical illusion
thread.title_full: Simone Biles and Shaq standing side by side at Super Bowl is like a dang optical illusion

author: Sam Laird
title: Simone Biles and Shaq standing side by side at Super Bowl is like a dang optical illusion
text:
Both Simone Biles and Shaquille O'Neal are legends in their respective sports. But that's about where the athletic comparisons end. Shaq stands 7-foot-1, while Biles is just 4-foot-9.
Get them together for a photo opp and you just might have the best pic of Super Bowl LI .
hey shaq üëãüèæ pic.twitter.com/YCrSufiyk7
‚Äî Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) February 5, 2017
Both the NBA legend and the Olympic gymnastics hero are in Houston as part of the media circus surrounding the big game, where Biles has already impressed Tom Brady .
BONUS: These are the most talked about Super Bowl LI ads that you won't want to miss
